sentences.english: It is used to set baud rate, parity check, number of data bits, stop bit.
sentences.chinese: 它是用来设置波特率，奇偶校验，数据位数，停止位。

sentences.english: In this paper, a motion compensated de-interlacing algorithm based on same-parity motion detection is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于同奇偶运动检测的运动补偿算法。

sentences.english: An improved watermarking algorithm of odd-even quantification based on chaotic map is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于混沌映射的改进奇偶量化水印算法。

sentences.english: A binary check digit; for example, a parity bit.
sentences.chinese: 一个二进位校验位元，例如奇偶位。

sentences.english: There is considerably less chance of an even-numbered error that eludes the B2 parity calculation.
sentences.chinese: 有偶数不到B2奇偶校验计算的错误的机会大大减少。

sentences.english: The common definition of singular and even function was given.
sentences.chinese: 给出了奇偶函数的一般性定义。

sentences.english: The parity setting for communication between the host and the device under test
sentences.chinese: 主机和测试设备之间的通信的奇偶校验设置。

sentences.english: The relationship between L-coupler's inherent parameters and odd-even modes is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了L型耦合线的固有参数和奇偶模的关系。

sentences.english: Redundant characters often work as checking devices, as in parity and other checks.
sentences.chinese: 冗余字符通常用作校验手段，如奇偶校验或其它校验。

sentences.english: Parity check matrix H is a key for the performance of LDPC codes.
sentences.chinese: 奇偶校验矩阵H是决定一个LDPC码性能的关键。

sentences.english: The parametric method of odd-even mode is adopted in this design.
sentences.chinese: 设计中利用了奇偶模参量法。

sentences.english: Double even-odd geometry is a new 3-D exploration method at home.
sentences.chinese: 双奇偶三维观测系统在国内是一种新的三维勘探方法。

sentences.english: So the whole idea of odd and even does not make sense for infinity.
sentences.chinese: 所以奇偶的判别对无穷大失效。
正在进行后台奇偶校验。

definition: repeated code/coincident code (i.e. two characters or words having the same encoding)
the units place (or column) in the decimal system
composite number (i.e. not prime, has a factorization)
complementary code/binary code with 0 and 1 interchanged
small figure/small amount/the part of a number to the right of the decimal point (or radix point)/fractional part of a number/number between 0 and 1/decimal fraction
Tarsus, Mediterranean city in Turkey, the birthplace of St Paul
rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
